title: Authorizes a permissive referendum to be initiated by the local government or voters on an amendment or adoption to local laws relating to the increase of taxes
summary: Authorizes a permissive referendum to be initiated by the local government or voters where a legislative body of a local government is amending or adopting local laws relating to the increase of taxes, fines, fees or surcharges pursuant to state legislative authority.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2912

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 21, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. P. LOPEZ, BURLING -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of
         A. CROUCH, SALADINO -- read once and  referred  to  the  Committee  on
         Local Governments

       AN  ACT to amend the municipal home rule law, in relation to authorizing
         a permissive referendum where a legislative body of a local government
         is amending or adopting local laws relating to the increase  of  taxes
         pursuant to state legislative authority

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 2 of section 24 of the municipal home rule  law
    2  is amended by adding a new paragraph l to read as follows:
    3    L.  IN  THE  CASE  WHERE  A  LEGISLATIVE BODY OF A GIVEN UNIT OF LOCAL
    4  GOVERNMENT IS GRANTED SPECIAL AUTHORITY  BY  THE  STATE  LEGISLATURE  TO
    5  AMEND  OR  ADOPT  LOCAL  LAWS  RELATING TO THE INCREASE OF TAXES, FINES,
    6  FEES, OR SURCHARGES AS A FUNCTION OF A HOME RULE  REQUEST  MADE  TO  THE
    7  STATE LEGISLATURE BY SAID LEGISLATIVE BODY.
    8    S  2.  This  act  shall take effect immediately and shall apply to any
    9  pending amendments or adoptions to local laws relating to  the  increase
   10  of taxes, fines, fees, or surcharges.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05989-01-1
